title: Man Details Syndrome That Makes His Body Produce Beer, But It's Unfortunately Not As Fun As It Sounds
description:
Apparently, there's a condition that causes one's body to produce beer. Which sounds like a pretty rad condition - though I prefer wine myself. But it's actually not as fun as it sounds.

Forty-year-old Mark Mongiardo of Florida says he has the rare condition, dubbed "auto-brewery syndrome," which causes an imbalance of microbiota to convert sugar to alcohol in his gut. It can be caused by a poor diet or antibiotic use.

\u201cI have a rare condition that causes my body to produce BEER https://t.co/X1Gb7vv61y\u201d
— Daily Mail Online (@Daily Mail Online) 1680321760

The syndrome causes Mark to appear drunk even when he hasn't had a drop of alcohol. He used to be a schoolteacher, but lost his job due to his constant state of apparent drunkeness. His bosses accused him of "smelling like beer" at school, which he probably did - but the scent was coming from the sugars in his gut.

He even got pulled over twice for "drunk-driving," telling TODAY: "'For years, [my wife] thought I was hiding drinking and I would come home each day and I would basically be drunk. I had symptoms of being intoxicated from slurring speech to balance issues. And this happened even at social events where I had not been drinking.'

He "lost everything" after the second time getting pulled over: "I had to sell my house, I had to sell my car. I couldn't get a job in education, I couldn't get a job at the grocery store. I had pending felony charges. You know, I was facing prison time for two DWI's when I had not been drinking."

To keep the syndrome under wraps, Mongiardo has to take 30 tablets of medication per day and eat an extreme low-carb diet, no pizza or pasta allowed. He takes a breathalyzer before every drive and now works at Target.

But there is some good news - the felony charges were dropped after the police took too long to bring them to trial. And at least now he and his family have a diagnosis. I can't imagine how bizarre and troubling it would be to never drink, but constantly feel and appear drunk.

>

<

Lily is a Zoomer college dropout who somehow landed a writing gig here at LwC.com. In her spare time, she enjoys going for runs, touching grass, and occasionally tweeting tweets for fellow tweeters.

title: WaPo's "fact-checker" gets fact-checked hard by Twitter, then gets fact-checked AGAIN when he whines about it
description:
Washington Post fact-checker Glenn Kessler got Community Notes'd into oblivion not once but TWICE over the weekend. And it's quite a sight to behold.

Last week, it is believed a memo went out to journalismers to defend the Soros-backed Manhattan DA Alvin Bragg by claiming he's not actually Soros-backed. Long story short: Soros has never been in Bragg's kitchen, something something, you're an antisemitic trope.

That's the rule? You're not "backed" by a donor if you didn't go whitewater rafting with him? https://t.co/DBWTjnsWE7
— David Weigel (@daveweigel) March 31, 2023


I get what's going on here but "George Soros has spent millions of dollars over the years to help elect reform DAs" is just a fact. It got him good press before Republicans re-upped their attacks on this. https://t.co/EmDsvuMe6Y
— David Weigel (@daveweigel) March 31, 2023

Another example of the left and the media (but I repeat myself) attempting to redefine definitions. This was never the standard when the left and the media (again, I repeat) blasted "Koch-funded" Republicans. Not unlike how the left and the media were never antisemitic for criticizing the donations of Jewish REPUBLICAN donor Sheldon Adelson.

WaPo's "fact" checker got his orders with the claim Bragg isn't Soros funded. Community Notes to the rescue: "Soros donated $1 million to the Color of Change PAC, the largest individual donation it received in the 2022 election cycle, days after it endorsed Bragg for district attorney and pledged more than $1 million in spending to support his candidacy."

Then when Kessler ATTACKED "trolls" who hit him with a Community Notes, by claiming the Notes said something it didn't, the Notes struck back: "The original Community Note says that the Color of Change PAC *pledged* $1 million. Soros donated $1 million to the PAC days after it endorsed Bragg and pledged more than $1 million in spending to support his candidacy. The PAC ultimately spent $420,000."

Once again at the Washington Post, democracy derps in the derpness.

Everyone who participates in the Community Notes program: we all worked together, with justice, to make this double note happen. I'm proud of you all. pic.twitter.com/m31SaCfchY
— Jeff Blehar is *BOX OFFICE POISON* (@EsotericCD) April 2, 2023

I give journalismers credit. It takes an impressive lack of dignity and self-respect to shill for the left like this. All while insulting your reader's intelligence by claiming you are unbiased and non-partisan. I could never do it. Journalismers at WaPo and NBC News manage to pull it off with great aplomb.

>

<

Brodigan is Grand Poobah of this here website and when he isn't writing words about things enjoys day drinking, pro-wrestling, and country music. You can find him on the Twitter too.

title: British Farmers Will Soon Be Forced To Feed Cows Anti-Fart Feed For The Planet
description:
The war on cow excrements continues. British farmers will soon be ordered to feed their cows "methane suppressants" to prevent their stinky burps and farts from polluting the environment. Priorities, people.

\u201cFarmers will be ordered to feed cows 'methane suppressants' under net zero plans \n https://t.co/trNlq9UOj9\u201d
— Daily Mail Online (@Daily Mail Online) 1680429394

The suppressants are apparently "compound feeds" that contain seaweed, essential oils, organic acids, probiotics, and antimicrobials that apparently reduce the amount of methane produced during a cow’s digestion. These suppressants could be introduced in 2025 "at pace," or as "soon as practically possible."

This is all part of the effort to reduce emissions by 20% by 2030, as required by Britain's commitment to the Global Methane Pledge. The methane suppressant addition came after concerns that the governments existing plans to reach "net-zero carbon" by 2050 were not detailed enough.

Oh, and of course this will increase the cost of milk. But who cares about money, right? We've got a planet to save. From cow farts. And good news -former government advisor on food strategy Dustin Benton told The Telegraph that the feed could soon be given to sheep, too! Yaay!

He also said this is just the start and that more must be done to prevent the dastardly emissions that come from livestock.

Let's hope our beloved AOC doesn't get wind of this. Cow farts have been her nemesis for years now, challenged perhaps only by the lovely lady behind Libs of TikTok. Recall in 2019 she literally tried to ban cow farts in her Green New Deal:

"We set a goal to get to net-zero, rather than zero emissions, in 10 years because we aren’t sure that we’ll be able to fully get rid of farting cows and airplanes that fast, but we think we can ramp up renewable manufacturing and power production, retrofit every building in America, build the smart grid, overhaul transportation and agriculture, plant lots of trees and restore our ecosystem to get to net-zero."

So, yeah. Something tells me she'd be completely on board with this agenda.

>

<

Lily is a Zoomer college dropout who somehow landed a writing gig here at LwC.com. In her spare time, she enjoys going for runs, touching grass, and occasionally tweeting tweets for fellow tweeters.

title: Watch: A star is born as Virginia's Lt. Governor drops bomb after bomb owning the left on "Real Time with Bill Maher"
description:
It's been a minute since we've heard from Virginia's Lt. Governor Winsome Sears. I'm not a Virginia resident, so I only get the media hits. The last one that stands out was Sears wrecking Dana Bash's sour-looking face. But Sears was a guest on Real Time with Bill Maher on Friday. Either she's going to be making more appearances from here on out. Or liberal bookers are going to avoid her like the plague because she's too effective.

The Nashville Shooter came up. While there is a serious debate about whether we should name mass shooters at all, the left is overly concerned about making sure we get the Nashville Shooter's gender identity right. Sears segued from there ("This person murdered six people. I don't really care who you say you are.") to a strong bit about schools going out of their way to hide things from parents.

EPIC…. Watch Winsome Sears take on the Trans and Drag Queen issue.

pic.twitter.com/Ecdff5e5Ou
— Juanita Broaddrick (@atensnut) April 1, 2023

Sears has always been strong on guns. "If you're breaking into my home while I'm waiting on the police to come, I'm gonna shoot you. That's just the way it is. I'm gonna pray for you, but I'm gonna shoot you."

Bill Maher ran into a buzzsaw tonight named @WinsomeSears

Good for him for having on an articulate conservative. Makes up for him booking Chris Sununu 🤣

She refuted the typical liberal talking points with grace, charm and humor tonight

Bill admitted to guns being necessary pic.twitter.com/xTxH3jcY8l
— Eric Abbenante (@EricAbbenante) April 1, 2023

And the part about pot and being from Jamaica is just funny.

🔥 @WinsomeSears BRINGS IT to her 1st appearance on @RealTimers. Full-on joyful warrior! I’ve never seen @billmaher enjoy a guest so much: “We should a a morning show together. We’d be perfect.” The great @BloodBrief made this quick montage. Which one-liner is your favorite? 🤣 pic.twitter.com/XnOSBKOxgc
— Asra Nomani (@AsraNomani) April 1, 2023

I know conservatives can sometimes get too excited anytime one of our own can string together a few sentences on television. Especially when even our favorites are solid on the talk, not so much the action. I'll let readers from Virginia let me know how their Lt. Governor is at getting things done.

Effective communication and being able to cross over into mainstream audiences remains an important component. In that regard, WInsome Sears crushes it.

>

<

Brodigan is Grand Poobah of this here website and when he isn't writing words about things enjoys day drinking, pro-wrestling, and country music. You can find him on the Twitter too.

title: Crowder receives his first YouTube strike under the Neal Mohan regime, will ONLY stream to Rumble this week
description:
The Neal Mohan regime at YouTube has begun. We just got our first strike! It was for a video called "Crowder Reacts to 13-Year-Old Drag Performer Twerking on Stage!" SPOILER: None of us are fans.

You may be wondering, "But...I thought you had a YouTube 'dump' button to prevent such events from occurring." We do, for the main page. So they went after the CrowderBits channel.

We have also removed a video from the CrowderBits channel. Crowder Reacts to 13-Year-Old Drag Performer Twerking on Stage! | Louder With Crowder was removed under our child safety policy, which prohibits statements that sexualize minors. A strike has been applied to the channel and uploads are suspended for one week.

Why, yes. The video is still available on Rumble. Thanks for asking.

I want you to think about this. A scantily clad male 13-year-old, dressed like a female stripper, grinding in front of adult men for their perverse entertainment doesn’t "sexualize minors" according to YouTube. Crowder, Gerald, and the Hodgetwins thinking the video is sick, disgusting, and gross does. Us criticizing all involved and saying they should be ashamed of themselves is what's strikeworthy.

This is YouTube. This is Big Tech. This is why we have MugClub.

So for the few of you left who haven't migrated over to Rumble yet, Louder with Crowder will NOT be streaming on YouTube this week. Here's what you need to do:

1. Sign up for MugClub. We can’t fight like hell and take the battle to Big Tech without the support of patriots and hooligans like YOU!

2. Tune in all week at 10:00 AM eastern on Rumble.

Crowder will have A LOT more to say on Monday morning 10:00 AM eastern. Ready your butts.

title: YouTube Launches ATTACK on Crowder For EXPOSING The Sexualization of Children & Criticizing Trans Shooter!
description:

First, NASHVILLE UNCENSORED: THE TRUTH FROM A TO Z! was removed under their elusive “hate speech” policy.

Second, WE'RE BACK! WAIT, TRUMP IS GOING TO JAIL?! was removed under their elusive “harassment” policy. Side note: this is also the video where we exposed new CEO Neal Mohan.

Third, over on CrowderBits, Crowder Reacts to 13-Year-Old Drag Performer Twerking on Stage! was removed under their policy against “statements that sexualize minors.” We watched a viral video of grown adults sexualizing a 13-year old drag queen, and said it was wrong. YouTube came after US for doing so.

This is EXACTLY what we warned against. The left can enact policy to transition your children and put them on a stripper pole. And when one of their deranged dogmatics murders your children, you best not speak about it.

THEY are coming after your children. THEY will try to silence you. WE will not take part in their lies. And we sure as hell won’t line the pockets of the LIARS.

Louder with Crowder will STILL be streaming on Monday…on Rumble and on MugClub. And I’ll have a lot – A LOT – more to say Monday morning, April 3rd, at 10:00 AM eastern.

For now, make sure you are signed up for MugClub. We can’t take the fight to BigTech without your support.

YouTube, Big Tech, and the radical left are coming for your children. We’re not going to let them.

We’ll see you Monday morning. Get ready to fight like hell.
